posts.title: Pan-African Transfer Learning - Building AI That Understands Africa
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: Today, we're excited to announce Msingi AI's ambitious research initiative focused on Pan-African Transfer Learning. This groundbreaking project aims to revolutionize how AI models learn and adapt across Africa's diverse linguistic and cultural landscape.

posts.title: Join the Msingi AI Data Challenge
posts.author: Kiplangat Korir
posts.excerpt: We're launching an exciting data challenge to help build better AI models for African languages. Join us in this initiative to improve machine translation and natural language processing for African languages.
